pages.text: Tamen de neixin chengren naxie jixiang, dan tamen wei bu yi he aoman er fouren ta. Ni kan bainong shifei zhe de jieju shi zenyang de.
Wo que yi ba xuewen shangci da wu de he su lai man, ta lia shuo: Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu! Ta ceng shi women chaoyue ta de xuduo xindao de puren.
Su lai man jicheng da wu de; ta shuo: Zhongren a! Women ceng xuehui bai niao de yuyan, women ceng huode wanwu de xiangshou, zhe que shi mingxian de enhui.
Su lai man de dajun--you jingling, renlei, niao lei zucheng de--bei zhaoji dao ta mianqian, tamen shi bushu zhengqi de.
Dengdao tamen lai dao yi gu de shihou, yige mu yi shuo: Mayimen a! Kuai jin ziji de zhuchu qu, yimian bei su lai man he ta de dajun buzhi bu jue de jianta.

Su lai man wei ta dehua er chayi di weixiaole, ta shuo: Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni qishi wo, shi wo changchang ganxie ni suo ci wo he wo de fumu de enhui, bing shi wo changchang zuo ni suo xiyue de shangong qiu ni jie ni de enhui shi wo de ru ni de shanliang de puren zhi lie.
Ta ceng jianyue zhong niao, ta shuo: Wo zenme bujian dai sheng ne? Ta quexi ma?
Wo biding yanli de chengfa ta, huo sha diao ta, chufei ta dai yige mingzheng lai gei wo.
Ta douliu bujiu, jiu laile, ta shuo: Wo zhidaole ni bu zhidao de shi, wo cong sai bai yi dai laile yige queshi de xiaoxi gei ni.
